About the Project

┬а ┬а ┬а ┬а

┬а ┬а ┬а ┬а ┬а This project showcases a modern, cloud-native solution for managing and monitoring Internet of Things (IoT) devices in real-time. ┬а ┬а ┬а ┬а ┬а Designed by the CSE - Q team of Anurag University, it demonstrates seamless integration between a device simulator, backend APIs, ┬а ┬а ┬а ┬а ┬а and an interactive web dashboard. ┬а ┬а ┬а ┬а

┬а ┬а ┬а
┬а ┬а ┬а
┬а ┬а ┬а ┬а

Team Contribution

┬а ┬а ┬а ┬а

┬а ┬а ┬а ┬а ┬а We applied cloud computing, microservices, and MQTT protocols. Our project reflects both technical capability and teamwork. ┬а ┬а ┬а ┬а

┬а ┬а ┬а
┬а ┬а ┬а
┬а ┬а ┬а ┬а
